info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 7:03PM EDT until July 29 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Alexander County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Northwestern Iredell County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Northeastern Caldwell County in western North Carolina... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 703 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Boomer, or 5 miles southeast of Elkville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Taylorsville, Stony Point, Love Valley, Hiddenite, Kings Creek, Vashti, Ellendale, Scotts and Millersville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
